OCD.name: fileSystemLoggerProvider
OCD.description: File System Logger Interceptor for z/OS Connect EE API Provider

AD.name: Sequence
AD.description: The sequence in which this interceptor should be processed with respect to other configured interceptors

AD.name: Log Directory
AD.description: Directory path where log files will be written (e.g., /var/zosconnect/logs)

AD.name: Max File Size
AD.description: Maximum size of each log file in bytes (default: 10485760 = 10MB)

AD.name: Max File Count
AD.description: Maximum number of log files to retain (default: 10)

AD.name: Request Headers
AD.description: Comma-separated list of request header names to capture (e.g., Content-Type,Authorization).

AD.name: Response Headers
AD.description: Comma-separated list of response header names to capture (e.g., Content-Type,X-Custom-Header).

AD.name: Include Body
AD.description: Include request and response bodies in log entries (default: false)
